description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区为履行《基本法》第二十三条规定的宪制责任，就危害国家安全的行为所制定的法律条文。
description.en: A piece of legislation enacted by the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region to fulfill its constitutional duty under Article 23 of the Basic Law, targeting acts that endanger national security.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区基本法第二十三条

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区基本法第二十三条
en: Article 23 of the Hong Kong Basic Law

description.zh-cn: 《香港特别行政区基本法》中规定香港特别行政区应自行立法禁止七种危害国家安全行为的条文。
description.en: A provision in the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region that requires the region to enact its own laws to prohibit seven types of acts that endanger national security.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由习近平提出的国家安全理论，强调国家安全在各领域的重要性。
description.en: A national security theory proposed by Xi Jinping, emphasizing the importance of national security in all fields.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第七届立法机关。
description.en: The 7th term of the legislature of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区现任行政长官。
description.en: The current Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区现任保安局局长。
description.en: The current Secretary for Security of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府负责维持公共秩序、出入境、海关、监狱及禁毒等事宜的决策局。
description.en: The policy bureau of the Hong Kong government responsible for public order, immigration, customs, prisons, and drug control.

nodes.id: 香港警务处国家安全处

zh-cn: 香港警务处国家安全处
en: National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force

description.zh-cn: 香港警务处下属的维护国家安全部门。
description.en: A department of the Hong Kong Police Force responsible for safeguarding national security.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主活动人士，前支联会副主席。
description.en: Hong Kong democracy activist and former vice-chairperson of the Hong Kong Alliance in Support of Patriotic Democratic Movements of China.

nodes.id: 国家安全（立法条文）条例草案

zh-cn: 国家安全（立法条文）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 2003年香港特别行政区政府为《基本法》第二十三条立法所提出的草案，后因大规模抗议而撤回。
description.en: The bill proposed by the HKSAR Government in 2003 for the legislation of Article 23 of the Basic Law, which was later withdrawn due to large-scale protests.

description.zh-cn: 一场反对《基本法》第二十三条立法的大规模游行示威活动。
description.en: A large-scale protest march against the legislation of Article 23 of the Basic Law.

en: Government of Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 一场反对《2019年逃犯及刑事事宜相互法律协助法例（修订）条例草案》的社会运动。
description.en: A social movement against the Fugitive Offenders and Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters Legislation (Amendment) Bill 2019.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 由全国人大常委会制定并列入《基本法》附件三在香港实施的全国性法律。
description.en: A national law enacted by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and implemented in Hong Kong by being listed in Annex III of the Basic Law.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
第十三届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常委，中央港澳工作领导小组组长。
description.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and leader of the Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macau Affairs.

nodes.id: 中央港澳工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央港澳工作领导小组
en: Central Leading Group on Hong Kong and Macau Affairs

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责领导香港和澳门事务的议事协调机构。
description.en: The deliberation and coordination organ of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for leading Hong Kong and Macau affairs.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主活动人士，现流亡英国。
description.en: Hong Kong democracy activist, currently in exile in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主活动人士，现流亡英国。
description.en: Hong Kong democracy activist, currently in exile in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 前英国驻香港总领事馆雇员，现流亡英国。
description.en: Former employee of the British Consulate-General in Hong Kong, currently in exile in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 香港社会活动人士，现流亡英国。
description.en: Hong Kong social activist, currently in exile in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 香港社会活动人士，现流亡英国。
description.en: Hong Kong social activist, currently in exile in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 前香港立法会议员，现流亡海外。
description.en: Former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council, currently in exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 前香港立法会议员，现流亡海外。
description.en: Former member of the Hong Kong Legislative Council, currently in exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 香港实业家、政治评论员，现流亡海外。
description.en: Hong Kong industrialist and political commentator, currently in exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主活动人士，现流亡海外。
description.en: Hong Kong democracy activist, currently in exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主活动人士，现流亡海外。
description.en: Hong Kong democracy activist, currently in exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主活动人士，现流亡海外。
description.en: Hong Kong democracy activist, currently in exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 香港律师，现流亡海外。
description.en: Hong Kong lawyer, currently in exile abroad.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门。
description.en: The executive department of the U.S. federal government responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 现任美国国务卿。
description.en: The current United States Secretary of State.

description.zh-cn: 现任英国外交大臣。
description.en: The current Foreign Secretary of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大政府负责外交、贸易和国际发展事务的部门。
description.en: The department of the Government of Canada that manages diplomatic and consular relations, promotes international trade, and leads Canada's international development and humanitarian assistance.

description.zh-cn: 一个由27个欧洲国家组成的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: A political and economic union of 27 member states that are located primarily in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的政府间国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization whose stated purposes are to maintain international peace and security, develop friendly relations among nations, achieve international cooperation, and be a centre for harmonizing the actions of nations.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一个社会民主主义政党。
description.en: A social democratic political party in Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 中共中央港澳工作办公室

zh-cn: 中共中央港澳工作办公室
en: Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CCP Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责港澳工作的办事机构。
description.en: The working agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for Hong Kong and Macau affairs.

nodes.id: 行政长官会同行政会议

zh-cn: 行政长官会同行政会议

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区的最高决策机关，由行政长官和行政会议成员组成。
description.en: The highest decision-making body in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, composed of the Chief Executive and members of the Executive Council.

nodes.id: 维护国家安全 ( 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区维护国家安全公署 ) 规例

zh-cn: 维护国家安全 ( 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区维护国家安全公署 ) 规例
en: Safeguarding National Security (Office for Safeguarding National Security of the Central People’s Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region) Regulation

description.zh-cn: 基于《维护国家安全条例》订立的附属法例。
description.en: A subsidiary legislation enacted under the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance.

nodes.id: 维护国家安全(禁地宣布)令

zh-cn: 维护国家安全(禁地宣布)令
en: Safeguarding National Security (Declaration of Prohibited Places) Order

description.zh-cn: 基于《维护国家安全条例》订立的附属法例。
description.en: A subsidiary legislation enacted under the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance.

relationships.source: 香港特别行政区基本法第二十三条

description.zh-cn: 《维护国家安全条例》是香港特别行政区为履行《基本法》第二十三条规定的宪制责任而进行的本地立法。
description.en: The Safeguarding National Security Ordinance is local legislation enacted by the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region to fulfill its constitutional responsibility as stipulated in Article 23 of the Basic Law.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月15日，习近平在中央国家安全委员会第一次会议上提出“总体国家安全观”。
description.en: On April 15, 2014, Xi Jinping proposed the 'Overall National Security Concept' at the first meeting of the Central National Security Commission.

description.zh-cn: 《维护国家安全条例》以“总体国家安全观”为指导原则。
description.en: The Safeguarding National Security Ordinance is guided by the 'Overall National Security Concept'.

position.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政长官
position.en: Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 李家超作为行政长官，领导并推动了《维护国家安全条例》的立法工作，并于2024年3月22日签署该条例使其生效。
description.en: As Chief Executive, John Lee led and promoted the legislative work of the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance, and signed it into law on March 22, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 邓炳强作为保安局局长，于2024年3月8日向立法会提交《维护国家安全条例草案》。
description.en: As the Secretary for Security, Chris Tang introduced the Safeguarding National Security Bill to the Legislative Council on March 8, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 香港第七届立法会于2024年3月19日三读全票通过《维护国家安全条例草案》。
description.en: The 7th Legislative Council of Hong Kong passed the Safeguarding National Security Bill with a unanimous vote on its third reading on March 19, 2024.

relationships.target: 国家安全（立法条文）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 50万名香港市民参与七一游行反对为《基本法》第二十三条立法，最终导致政府撤回《国家安全（立法条文）条例草案》。
description.en: 500,000 Hong Kong citizens participated in the July 1st march to oppose the legislation of Article 23 of the Basic Law, which ultimately led to the government's withdrawal of the National Security (Legislative Provisions) Bill.

relationships.target: 国家安全（立法条文）条例草案

description.zh-cn: 在巨大争议和大规模抗议后，香港政府于2003年9月5日最终撤回《国家安全（立法条文）条例草案》。
description.en: After significant controversy and large-scale protests, the Hong Kong government ultimately withdrew the National Security (Legislative Provisions) Bill on September 5, 2003.

relationships.source: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 2019年爆发的“反送中”运动，促使中央政府制定并在香港实施《香港国安法》以“止暴制乱”。
description.en: The Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement that broke out in 2019 prompted the Central Government to enact and implement the Hong Kong National Security Law to 'stop violence and curb disorder'.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人大常委会于2020年6月30日表决通过《中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法》。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress voted to pass the Law of the People's Republic of China on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region on June 30, 2020.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 《香港国安法》未涵盖《基本法》第二十三条规定的所有罪行，因此特区政府认为仍有必要进行本地立法以完成宪制责任。
description.en: The Hong Kong National Security Law did not cover all the offenses stipulated in Article 23 of the Basic Law, thus the HKSAR government deemed it necessary to proceed with local legislation to fulfill its constitutional duty.

description.zh-cn: 丁薛祥在会见港澳人大代表团时表示，香港基本法第23条要尽早完成立法。
description.en: During a meeting with NPC deputies from Hong Kong and Macau, Ding Xuexiang stated that the legislation of Article 23 of the Hong Kong Basic Law should be completed as soon as possible.

relationships.source: 香港警务处国家安全处

description.zh-cn: 香港警方国安处首次引用《维护国家安全条例》，拘捕了包括邹幸彤在内的多人，指控其涉嫌违反“煽动意图的相关罪行”。
description.en: The National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance for the first time to arrest multiple individuals, including Chow Hang-tung, on suspicion of 'offences in connection with seditious intention'.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府引用《维护国家安全条例》，对罗冠聪等六名潜逃英国人士采取限制措施，包括撤销其特区护照。
description.en: The Hong Kong government invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance to impose restrictive measures on six fugitives in the UK, including Nathan Law, such as the cancellation of his HKSAR passport.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府引用《维护国家安全条例》，对刘祖廸等六名潜逃英国人士采取限制措施。
description.en: The Hong Kong government invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance to impose restrictive measures on six fugitives in the UK, including Finn Lau.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府引用《维护国家安全条例》，对郑文杰等六名潜逃英国人士采取限制措施。
description.en: The Hong Kong government invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance to impose restrictive measures on six fugitives in the UK, including Simon Cheng.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府引用《维护国家安全条例》，对霍嘉志等六名潜逃英国人士采取限制措施。
description.en: The Hong Kong government invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance to impose restrictive measures on six fugitives in the UK, including Hok Ka-chi.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府引用《维护国家安全条例》，对蔡明达等六名潜逃英国人士采取限制措施。
description.en: The Hong Kong government invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance to impose restrictive measures on six fugitives in the UK, including Choi Ming-da.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府引用《维护国家安全条例》，将许智峰列为“潜逃者”并实施限制措施。
description.en: The Hong Kong government invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance to declare Ted Hui a 'fugitive' and impose restrictive measures.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府引用《维护国家安全条例》，将郭荣铿列为“潜逃者”并实施限制措施。
description.en: The Hong Kong government invoked the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance to declare Dennis Kwok a 'fugitive' and impose restrictive measures.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院就《维护国家安全条例》的通过表示担忧，认为其定义不明确，可能加速香港社会的封闭。
description.en: The U.S. Department of State expressed concern over the passage of the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance, stating that its vague definitions could accelerate the closing of Hong Kong's society.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务卿布林肯表示该条例可能对在港美国公民和企业产生广泛影响，并宣布对香港官员实施签证限制。
description.en: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken stated the ordinance could have a broad impact on American citizens and businesses in Hong Kong and announced visa restrictions on Hong Kong officials.

description.zh-cn: 英国外交大臣卡梅伦表示该条例将进一步损害香港的权利和自由。
description.en: UK Foreign Secretary David Cameron stated the ordinance would 'further damage the rights and freedoms' in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟发表声明称，《维护国家安全条例》可能会加剧对香港基本自由和政治多元化的侵蚀。
description.en: The EU issued a statement saying the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance could exacerbate the 'erosion of fundamental freedoms and political pluralism' in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 社会民主连线成员在政府总部门外抗议二十三条立法。
description.en: Members of the League of Social Democrats protested against the Article 23 legislation outside the Central Government Offices.

relationships.source: 中共中央港澳工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 中共中央港澳办就《维护国家安全条例》全票通过发布声明祝贺，形容此举开启“由治及兴”的新篇章。
description.en: The Hong Kong and Macao Work Office of the CCP Central Committee issued a statement congratulating the unanimous passage of the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance, describing it as opening a new chapter of 'moving from governance to prosperity'.

relationships.source: 行政长官会同行政会议
relationships.target: 维护国家安全 ( 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区维护国家安全公署 ) 规例

description.zh-cn: 行政长官会同行政会议通过订立基于《维护国家安全条例》的附属法例《维护国家安全 ( 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区维护国家安全公署 ) 规例》。
description.en: The Chief Executive-in-Council passed the subsidiary legislation 'Safeguarding National Security (Office for Safeguarding National Security of the Central People’s Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region) Regulation' based on the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance.

relationships.source: 行政长官会同行政会议
relationships.target: 维护国家安全(禁地宣布)令

description.zh-cn: 行政长官会同行政会议通过订立基于《维护国家安全条例》的附属法例《维护国家安全(禁地宣布)令》。
description.en: The Chief Executive-in-Council passed the subsidiary legislation 'Safeguarding National Security (Declaration of Prohibited Places) Order' based on the Safeguarding National Security Ordinance.
